product_name: Brooks Essential Half-Zip Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The men's Brooks Essential Half-Zip top works hard to keep you comfortable on cool days, and it's perfect under a shell in colder weather. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying polyester offers soft stretch, top-notch performance and high mobility. Front zipper offers ventilation, and a stormflap shuts out chilling drafts. Thumbholes hold sleeves in place when arms are in motion and keep wrists warm. Hidden zippered rear pocket stashes essentials. The semifitted Brooks Essential Half-Zip top is not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: The men's Brooks Essential Half-Zip top works hard to keep you comfortable on cool days, and it's perfect under a shell in colder weather.
